(35544, 38139).description: A type of soil or rock that remains frozen for two or more consecutive years, affecting water availability and climate patterns

(37705, 40480).name: Permafrost
(37705, 40480).label: natural hazard
(37705, 40480).description: A permanently frozen layer of soil and rock, playing a crucial role in regulating water availability and climate conditions

(37705, 40480).name: Volcanic eruptions
(37705, 40480).label: weather event
(37705, 40480).description: A natural disaster that can impact global climate patterns by releasing large amounts of ash and aerosols into the atmosphere

(37705, 40480).name: Stable carbon isotopes
(37705, 40480).label: variable
(37705, 40480).description: A measure of the ratio of carbon-13 to carbon-12 in a sample, used as an indicator of drought conditions and climate variability

(37705, 40480).name: Evapotranspiration
(37705, 40480).label: variable
(37705, 40480).description: The process by which water is transferred from the land to the atmosphere through evaporation and plant transpiration

(37705, 40480).name: Pinatubo eruption
(37705, 40480).label: weather event
(37705, 40480).description: A major volcanic eruption that occurred in 1991, affecting global climate patterns

(37705, 40480).name: Tree-ring cellulose
(37705, 40480).label: variable
(37705, 40480).description: A component of tree rings used for analyzing stable carbon and oxygen isotopes

(37705, 40480).name: TRW
(37705, 40480).label: variable
(37705, 40480).description: Tree-ring width, a measure of tree growth and climate conditions

(37705, 40480).name: CWT
(37705, 40480).label: variable
(37705, 40480).description: Cellulose width of tree rings, used as a proxy for climate conditions

(40080, 42855).name: volcanic eruption
(40080, 42855).label: weather event
(40080, 42855).description: A sudden and violent release of energy from a volcano, affecting the climate and environment

(40080, 42855).name: hydrological regime
(40080, 42855).label: variable
(40080, 42855).description: The characteristic pattern of water movement and storage within a region, influenced by climate, geology, and land use

(40080, 42855).name: tree-ring
(40080, 42855).label: instrument
(40080, 42855).description: A method of measuring the growth patterns of trees to reconstruct past climate conditions

(40080, 42855).name: regional climates
(40080, 42855).label: location
(40080, 42855).description: The unique climate conditions of a specific region, shaped by factors such as latitude, altitude, and proximity to large bodies of water

(40080, 42855).name: global climate models
(40080, 42855).label: model
(40080, 42855).description: Sophisticated computer simulations used to represent and predict the Earth's climate system

(40080, 42855).name: atmospheric transmissivity
(40080, 42855).label: variable
(40080, 42855).description: The ability of the atmosphere to allow the passage of radiation, influencing the climate and weather patterns

(40080, 42855).name: stable isotope parameters
(40080, 42855).label: variable
(40080, 42855).description: Measurements of the ratio of stable isotopes in a sample, used to reconstruct past climate conditions

(40080, 42855).name: radiative forcing effects
(40080, 42855).label: variable
(40080, 42855).description: The influence of radiation on the climate system, driving changes in temperature and weather patterns

(40080, 42855).name: Northern Hemisphere
(40080, 42855).label: location
(40080, 42855).description: The half of the Earth north of the equator, characterized by diverse climate conditions

(40080, 42855).name: PAGES ISO2K
(40080, 42855).label: project
(40080, 42855).description: An international research project aimed at reconstructing and understanding past climate conditions

(42504, 43126).name: PAGES ISO2K
(42504, 43126).label: project
(42504, 43126).description: The Past Global Changes (PAGES) Integrated Oxygen Isotope Analysis of 2,000-year tree-ring records, a project focused on studying past climate variability through tree-ring oxygen isotope analysis

(42504, 43126).name: TRW
(42504, 43126).label: variable
(42504, 43126).description: Tree-ring width, a measure used in dendrochronology to study past climate conditions
